price: 24. Ya solo, totindaki yo na bosembo ete ozala mokebisi mpe mopesi sango ya malamu, mpo umma(1) moko te oyo eleka sé bazua mokebisi.
arabic: إِنَّآ أَرۡسَلۡنَٰكَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ بَشِيرٗا وَنَذِيرٗاۚ وَإِن مِّنۡ أُمَّةٍ إِلَّا خَلَا فِيهَا نَذِيرٞ
footnotes: 1 Umma: Awa elakisi: "Etuka"; Bótala suratu Al-Baqarah mokapo: 128.

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: innā arsalnāka bil-ḥaqi bashīran wanadhīran wa-in min ummatin illā khalā fīhā nadhīrun
